title: Varus Abs Appreciation thread
body:
I have to say this Darkin is an artist of {{champion:202}}'s caliber. He took two plain looking guys and reforged them into this masterpiece.

One day I will look at this splash with the eyes of an art critic and point out every imperfection. 

But that day is not today.

Today we enjoy.

Yeah, we all love Vlad for his personality :^)
I can't wait to read about all of the things he did and how none of them were wrong.
~~Guts~~{{champion:122}} will be triggered
When is he not though?

Omggg I totally guessed Pentakill Morde, but another Rioter looked up the group splash and saw that he was covered up! I SHOULD'VE KNOWN TO CHECK THE LOADING SCREEN. Bless.

The amount of relatable-ness and personality Riot and Riot Employees  make me so happy. I really love how Riot can be social, and willing to communicate with it's fans. I love you Riot/Riot Employees. (U especially LoveStrut :3)

https://cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/8422033/Sejuani_Splash_1.jpg
Don't forget this quality washboard.
What about Kayn, Yasuo, and Sea Hunter Aatrox :(

"Appreciation" doesnt cover how I feel about this splash.

Slavish arousal is more apt.

He's a good looking dude.

But more importantly - someone save this thread for when we hear complaints about objectifying female champions.

Objectification isn't a problem per se, it becomes one when it's the default (which has long been, and partly still is, true for female characters, much less so for male characters) :)
So in this case, objectification is good since it helps even the floor between male and female characters
The abs seem to go up a bit too high, but overall not bad at all. I mean what do I know about the anatomy of a darkin? {{champion:266}} {{champion:141}}
Kayn's nipple shows in his splash art but is not visible on his player model. he's ACTUALLY unplayable

Copy of what I said below to the negative Nancy: 
"Quick Point: Abdominal muscles climb up the torso and sit above you waist and fall directly under your pectoral muscles. So with different body types come different muscle definition. Varus being lean and taller with a **'V'** shaped figure means that his abs will also follow this** 'V'** shape; you can see that with how they slant inwards with the bottom 2 sections of muscle melding into the** 'V'** his hipbones make leading to the fun zone. 

Most depictions of people have the **')  (' ** shape (even when dealing with men) cause that's how it usually works in art and nature. Varus isn't naturally formed though he was made to be perfection (Queue {{champion:202}} Music). He has a 8 pack and a** 'V' **shaped body; his muscles sit where they would on that type of body."

Having spent much of my time at the gym with guys much more fit than I could ever hope to be. I can tell you that what is pictured in the splash art is unlike any upper abdominal muscles I have ever seen.

Where is this image from? Is this a fan-art of some sort? 

I love it {{sticker:sg-jinx}} coming from a long time Varus main <3
It's his new splash art

Holy shit, I love Riot so much. They are giving my main so much love <3.

Your abs are really really hot

Love, Fleur
I see you really Abpreciate it
